overview: When radiation left behind by atomic weapons testing creates a gigantic killer mutant arachnid, it's up to a trio of scientists, an Army general, and a newspaper reporter and his fianc√©e to figure out how to stop the hungry beast from devouring the entire county.
tagline: NO ONE IS SAFE FROM THIS BLOODTHIRSTY MONSTER!  EIGHT CREEPING CRAWLING LEGS OF SHEER TERROR!
title: The Giant Spider
